availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of William O. Brewer and Frances Brewer. Resident of Henry County in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Henry County in 1850. Resident of Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p.398A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 267.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Port Royal District, p. 368B.
"John W Brewer (1840-1878)," Find A Grave, Memorial 28936311, accessed December 6, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28936311.
